aiSettings.title: AI Assistant
aiSettings.subtitle: Configure the artificial intelligence that serves your patients via WhatsApp.
aiSettings.providerInfoAnthropic: Excellent context understanding and professional tone. Ideal for patient care.
aiSettings.providerInfoOpenai: Wide variety of models. GPT-4o Mini is the most cost-effective option on the market.
aiSettings.providerInfoGoogle: Flash models are very fast and affordable. Gemini 2.5 Flash has a generous free tier.
aiSettings.providerAndModelDesc: Choose which AI provider will be used to generate responses.
aiSettings.apiKeyConfiguredHint: API key configured. Leave blank to keep the current one.
aiSettings.pricingNote: Prices: input / output per 1 million tokens. A typical conversation uses ~500-2000 tokens.
aiSettings.connectionError: Connection failed. Check the API Key.
aiSettings.welcomeMessagePlaceholder: Message sent when the patient starts a conversation...
aiSettings.capabilitiesDesc: Define what the AI is allowed to do in the system.
aiSettings.autoScheduleDesc: Allow the AI to create new appointments.
aiSettings.autoConfirmDesc: The AI can automatically confirm appointments.
aiSettings.notifyTransferDesc: Notify when transferring to a human.
aiSettings.workingHoursOnlyDesc: The AI only responds during business hours.
aiSettings.contextMessagesDesc: How many previous messages to send to the AI.
aiSettings.advancedDesc: Provide specific guidelines for your clinic's service.
aiSettings.customInstructionsPlaceholder:
Examples:
- Always mention free parking
- We accept credit cards up to 12 installments
- Prioritize morning appointments
- Offer 10% discount for new patients
- Our differentiator is personalized care
aiSettings.customInstructionsHint: Maximum 2000 characters. Use for your clinic's specific rules.
aiSettings.transferKeywordsHint: Comma-separated. When the patient uses these words, the AI stops and transfers to a human agent.
aiSettings.blockedTopics: Topics the AI should not discuss
aiSettings.blockedTopicsHint: Comma-separated. The AI will politely refuse to discuss these topics.
aiSettings.advancedTip: The AI already has automatic access to your services, prices, dentists and available schedules. You don't need to repeat this information in custom instructions. Use this field only for your clinic's specific rules.
aiSettings.interactiveDesc: Configure menus, buttons and interactive surveys on WhatsApp for a richer experience.
aiSettings.welcomeMenuDesc: Options list when the patient starts a conversation.
aiSettings.timeslotListDesc: Available time slots in a selectable list.
aiSettings.sendLocationDesc: Send clinic map when asked for the address.
aiSettings.sendLocationHint: Configure latitude and longitude in the clinic's general settings.
aiSettings.dentistWhatsappDesc: Allow dentists to interact with the AI via WhatsApp to check schedules, cancel and reschedule.
aiSettings.enableDentistAiDesc: Dentists can check schedules, cancel and reschedule via WhatsApp.
aiSettings.dentistAiHow: The dentist sends a message via WhatsApp and the AI automatically recognizes them by their registered number. Features:
aiSettings.dentistAiNote: Dentists must have their phone number registered in the system.
aiSettings.remindersDesc: Send automatic reminders via WhatsApp before scheduled appointments.
aiSettings.reminder24hDesc: Sends a message one day before the appointment.
aiSettings.reminder1hDesc: Sends a message one hour before the appointment.
aiSettings.reminderMessagePlaceholder:
Leave blank to use the default message.

Variables: {patientName}, {date}, {time}, {service}, {dentist}, {clinicName}
aiSettings.reminderHow: The system automatically checks every 5 minutes for upcoming appointments and sends reminders via WhatsApp.
aiSettings.reminderConfirmNote: The patient receives a message asking to confirm with YES or NO. The response is processed by the AI normally.

emailSettings.defaultSmtpNote: If no SMTP is configured, the system will use the server's default settings.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Manage two-factor authentication (2FA) for your account.
security.whatsappDescription: A 6-digit code will be sent to your WhatsApp at each login.
security.authenticatorDescription: Use an authenticator app to generate temporary codes.
security.disableDescription: Remove two-factor protection from your account.
security.setupWhatsappSubtitle: Receive verification codes on your WhatsApp
security.phoneFormat: Format: country code + area code + number (e.g.: 5521999999999)
security.whatsappLoginNote: At each login, we will send a 6-digit code to this number. The code expires in 5 minutes.
security.manualEntry: Or enter manually in the app:
security.disableWarning: Your account will be less protected
security.disableExplanation: By disabling two-factor authentication, your account will only be protected by your password. We recommend keeping 2FA active.

whatsappSettings.title: WhatsApp Settings
whatsappSettings.subtitle: Connect your clinic to WhatsApp for automations and reminders.
whatsappSettings.qrCodeFailed: Failed to generate QR Code. Check your credentials.
whatsappSettings.statusConnected: Your WhatsApp instance is active and connected.
whatsappSettings.zapiCredentialsDesc: Enter your Z-API instance details to enable message sending.
whatsappSettings.qrCodeDesc: Scan the QR Code with your WhatsApp to connect the instance. The code refreshes automatically every 15 seconds.
whatsappSettings.qrCodeInstructions: Open WhatsApp on your phone > Menu > Linked devices > Link a device
whatsappSettings.saveCredentialsFirst: Save the Z-API credentials first to generate the QR Code.
whatsappSettings.sendTestDesc: Send a test message to verify the integration is working correctly.
whatsappSettings.phoneHint: Enter the full number with country code + area code + number. Brazil: 5521999999999. Brazilian numbers (area code only) are also accepted.
whatsappSettings.credentialsHelp: Access the Z-API dashboard, create an instance and copy the Instance ID, Token and Client-Token generated to link your WhatsApp Business account.

automations.title: WhatsApp Automations
automations.subtitle: Configure automatic messages to engage patients
automations.remindersNote: Appointment reminders (24h and 1h before) are configured on the AI page, section "Automatic Reminders".
automations.followUpDesc: Sends an automatic message after a completed appointment, asking how the patient is feeling.
automations.followUpTemplate: Hello {patientName}! How are you feeling after the {service} procedure? If you have any questions or discomfort, don't hesitate to contact us. {clinicName} Team
automations.birthdayDesc: Sends a message on the patient's birthday (at 9 AM). Requires registered date of birth.
automations.birthdayTemplate: Happy birthday, {patientName}! The {clinicName} team wishes you a wonderful day! Take the opportunity to take care of your smile with special conditions this month.
automations.reactivationDesc: Contacts patients who haven't visited the clinic in months, inviting them to return. Runs weekly (Mondays).
automations.reactivationTemplate: Hello {patientName}! We miss you at {clinicName}. It's been a while since your last visit. How about scheduling a follow-up appointment? Reply to check available times!

marketing.trialBadge: 14 days free — no credit card required
marketing.featuresSubtitle: From scheduling to artificial intelligence — features designed for everyday dentistry.
marketing.featureScheduleDesc: Manage appointments with daily, weekly, or monthly views. Automatic WhatsApp confirmation.
marketing.featurePatientsDesc: Complete digital records with history, anamnesis, photos, and organized documents.
marketing.featureOdontogramDesc: Interactive odontogram with dental surface marking, procedure history, and visual legend.
marketing.featureWhatsappDesc: Send reminders, confirmations, and automated messages. 24/7 scheduling chatbot.
marketing.featureAiDesc: Generate records, treatment plans, and patient summaries with artificial intelligence.
marketing.featurePrescriptionDesc: Create prescriptions and certificates with your clinic's identity. Send via WhatsApp or email.
marketing.featureReportsDesc: Revenue by dentist, cash flow, commissions, and CSV/Excel export.
marketing.featureNotificationsDesc: Receive alerts for appointments, payments, and important actions instantly.
marketing.featureNpsDesc: Automatic post-appointment satisfaction surveys. Direct promoters to Google Reviews.
marketing.featurePwaDesc: Access from any device. Install as a mobile app without an app store.
marketing.featureSearchDesc: Find patients, navigate, and execute actions in seconds with the command palette.
marketing.featureSecurityDesc: 2FA authentication, encrypted data, role-based access control, and LGPD compliance.
marketing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of professionals who have already simplified their management. Start your 14-day free trial now.
marketing.footerDescription: The complete platform for dental clinic management.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent plans
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale as your clinic grows.
pricing.basicPlanDesc: Ideal for getting started. Manage your clinic with essential features.
pricing.standardPlanDesc: For growing clinics. WhatsApp, basic AI, and full reports.
pricing.premiumPlanDesc: Everything unlimited. Full AI, WhatsApp automations, automatic invoicing, and priority support.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.
faq.q1: Do I need to install any software?
faq.a1: No. Our platform is 100% online and works in any browser. You can also install it as a mobile app (PWA) directly from your browser, no app store needed.
faq.a2: The Basic plan is free forever with up to 50 patients and 2 dentists. For advanced features like WhatsApp, AI, and full reports, you can upgrade at any time.
faq.a3: Yes. We use encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest. 2FA authentication, role-based access control, and LGPD compliance. Your data is yours — you can export or delete it at any time.
faq.q4: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.a4: Yes. There are no commitments or cancellation fees. You can downgrade or cancel whenever you want. Your data remains available for 30 days after cancellation.
faq.a5: We use Z-API for WhatsApp integration. You connect your number in the settings area and can send reminders, confirmations, and automated messages to your patients.
faq.q6: Does artificial intelligence replace the dentist?
faq.a6: Not at all. AI is a support tool that helps generate records from notes, suggest treatment plans, and create patient summaries. Every clinical decision is always made by the professional.
faq.q7: Can I migrate data from another system?
faq.a7: Yes. We offer CSV/Excel import for patients, dentists, and services. For more complex migrations, contact our support team.
faq.q8: How many people can use it simultaneously?
faq.a8: There is no limit on simultaneous users. Each team member has their own login with configurable permissions (admin, dentist, receptionist).
